name: Jason
review: This was a very good plugin.

name: Steve
review: Installed it and my server immediately felt 12% cooler. Highly scientific.

name: Alex
review: I don’t know what half the settings do but I turned them all on and now I feel powerful.

name: Herobrine
review: Removed me from the server. Respect.

name: Grandma42
review: I thought this was Facebook but now my grandson says the server is "cracked".

name: NotchTotally
review: Pretty good but it didn’t add diamonds to my inventory automatically.

name: AFKFarmer
review: Went to make a sandwich, came back, and everything was still working. Impressive.

name: LagLord
review: Still lagging but now I lag with style.

name: ConsoleWarrior
review: I typed /help and my life started to make sense.

name: PixelPirate
review: Arrr, me server be runnin’ smoother than the high seas!

name: 404User
review: I don’t know how I got here but I blame this plugin.

name: TryHardTim
review: Gained 3 FPS and immediately went pro.

name: BedrockBob
review: Works great, still can’t break bedrock though. Minus one star for realism.
